## Compliance & Standards

### Data Protection

- ✅ **GDPR** (European Union) - Full user rights implementation
- ✅ **CCPA/CPRA** (California) - Complete consumer rights coverage
- ✅ **Indian IT Act 2000** - SPDI Rules and CERT-In compliance
- ✅ **Consumer Protection Act 2019** (India)

### Security Standards

- ✅ **SOC 2 Type II** - Security and availability commitments
- ✅ **ISO 27001** - Information security management practices
- ✅ **HIPAA** - Available for healthcare projects (with BAA)

### International Compliance

- ✅ **EU Consumer Rights Directive** - 14-day cooling-off period
- ✅ **UK Consumer Rights Act 2015**
- ✅ **FTC Guidelines** (USA)
- ✅ State-specific laws (Virginia CDPA, Colorado CPA, Connecticut CTDPA)

For detailed compliance information, see [Legal & Compliance](.github/legal-compliance.md).

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How do I get started?

Book a free consultation at https://kvshvl.setmore.com or email writetokushaldsamant@gmail.com

### What industries do you serve?

We serve technology, e-commerce, healthcare, professional services, and other industries requiring custom SaaS solutions.

### Do you work with international clients?

Yes, we serve clients globally with compliance for GDPR, CCPA, and other international standards.

### What is your refund policy?

We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on SaaS subscriptions and clear refund terms for development projects. See https://kushalsamant.github.io/cancellationrefund.html

### How long does development take?

Timeline varies by project complexity. Typical projects range from 4-16 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during your free consultation.

### What technologies do you use?

We work with modern tech stacks including React, Node.js, Python, cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP), databases, and more. Technology is selected based on your specific needs.
